summary: Documentation contains incorrect line number references (3 inaccuracies found)

failures.criterion: AC2: Change is tested and verified
failures.expected: Line reference 38-48 should point to RLS policy checking platform admin
failures.actual: Lines 38-48 are CREATE INDEX statements. Actual RLS policy is at lines 54-64
failures.evidence: supabase/migrations/20251201000001_add_funnel_events.sql - lines 38-48 contain indexes, not RLS policy

failures.criterion: AC2: Change is tested and verified
failures.expected: Line reference 23-28 should point to organizations RLS policy creation
failures.actual: Lines 23-28 are DROP POLICY statements. Actual policy creation is at lines 40-44
failures.evidence: supabase/migrations/20251129400000_fix_platform_admin_rls.sql - lines 23-28 drop old policies, lines 40-44 create new policy

failures.criterion: AC2: Change is tested and verified
failures.expected: Documentation claims both policies use is_platform_admin() function
failures.actual: funnel_events policy uses direct column check (users.is_platform_admin = true), only organizations policy uses the function

recommendation: Correct line number references: (1) Change 38-48 to 54-64 for funnel_events, (2) Change 23-28 to 40-44 for organizations policy, (3) Clarify function usage claim or standardize RLS pattern
notes: Security mechanisms work correctly - only documentation accuracy is the issue. Not critical but fails 'tested and verified' acceptance criterion.
